signals.problem_statement: The customer service team is currently managing multiple email inboxes, leading to inefficiencies in handling customer queries.
signals.customer_ask: We need a system in place to combine the inboxes for better organization.
signals.context: Team of 4-5 people managing customer service across multiple email addresses.

signals.problem_statement: Inquiries from the app are not being tracked effectively, leading to dropped queries.
signals.customer_ask: We need a way to track inquiries coming from the app.
signals.context: Team of 4-5 people managing customer service with inquiries coming from both email and a mobile app.

signals.problem_statement: There is no current capability to link app communications with the email management system.
signals.customer_ask: Can we integrate app communications into the email management system?
signals.context: Team of 4-5 people managing customer service with inquiries coming from both email and a mobile app.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to categorize and streamline incoming queries through a form on their website.
signals.customer_ask: Is it possible to set up a form on our website to categorize queries?
signals.context: Team of 4-5 people managing customer service with inquiries coming from both email and a mobile app.
